title: Norwich Castle
description: Built by the Normans. It now serves as a museum and art gallery.

title: Norwich Cathedral
description: Completed in 1145, featuring stunning Romanesque architecture.

title: Norwich Market
description: One of the oldest and largest outdoor markets in the country, featuring colorful roofs.

title: River Wensum
description: A picturesque 15th-century watergate located on the River Wensum.

title: The Forum
description: A stunning modern glass building housing the library and community events.

title: Strangers' Hall
description: A fascinating museum of domestic history housed in a beautiful Tudor building.

title: Plantation Garden
description: A secret, restored Victorian town garden that acts as a peaceful oasis in the city.
